title: Pinnacle Game Profiler v5 + Serial [Mbb]
description:
Major Features

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Works with any controller! (Xbox 360, PlayStation, Wiimote, PC gamepads, etc.)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Full emulation of keyboard and mouse (even use your gamepad to control Windows)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Game Profiles can be auto-applied when Pinnacle detects you've started a game
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Built-in PinnacleUpdate feature keeps your software and game profiles up-to-date
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Create your own custom game commands, keyboard hotkeys, and automated macros
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Force feedback commands can be assigned direclty to your game controller
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢On-screen help guides you through the simple process of creating your profiles

Advanced Features

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Setup a joystick to run or walk depeding on how far forward you tilt the joystick
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Assign a shift button to double the commands you can assign to a controller
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Create toggle commands and cycling commands that rotate each time you fire them
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Two separate triggering events (pressed & released) give you complete control
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Design an ImageGuide for your controller to guide you while you assign commands
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Direction pad support features three styles:  standard 4-Way, simple 4-Way, and 8-Way
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Invert the movement axis of any analog joystick

Change Log V5

Fixes and Improvements

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fixed process enumeration for x64 operating systems (automatic activation and deactivation of profiles now works properly, multiple instances now fixed)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Hotswapping with an axis command inside a joystick command has been fixed
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fixed display for some Windows Themes that didn't look as expected
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fixed problem that was causing freezes for some users when optical drives were checked during game detection. Optical drives are now excluded.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fix to prevent the failure of updates on PinnacleUpdate that some users were seeing
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Fix for wireless controllers on Vista 64 for idle-sleep crash
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Improved form loading speed and efficiency (hopefully improving overall stability)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Improved map to mouse spring feature to work better in full-screen games
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Improvements to Axis Command handling, ensuring super-fast changes don't cause any unexpected results (particularly relevant when using pause steps in the subcommands)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Improved keyboard hotkey handling
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Minor tweaks and fixes too numerous to mention
New Features in PGP 5.x
Note that the changes listed in these release notes do not reflect all the changes in PGP v5.x.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Support for Windows 7 Operating System
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Complete overhaul of internal structuring for existing and future features 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Server storage changes made to streamline post v5.x formatting on PinnacleUpdate
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Command names now stored in central directory for easy updating
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Unique command id's replace previous command name based system
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦New structuring includes room to store all the new behavior modifications and future planned features
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Profile compatibility translators from v4.x to v5.x (new profiles will not be backwards compatible)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢New icons designed, created, and added to user interface to represent new and previous features.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢A deadzone can now be applied to triggers by decreasing the axis range of an individual axis
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Option added to export all profiles at once
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Environmental variables like %APPPATH%, %APPDATA%, and %PROGRAMFILES% can now be used in event step paths
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Previously shifted and unshifted commands shared the same "d-pad style" but now you can set different styles for different shift-states
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢New quad-shift system added 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Commands can now be executed along with shifts
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Symbolically color coded to distinguish states: blue, red, yellow, green
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Configurations now can have up to four shift states
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢New Behavior Modification system added 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Command-level modifiers that make using some of Pinnacle's features more accessible, quicker, and easier
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Command-level modifiers are not mutually exclusive!!! ( at least for current feature set)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Virtual stickiness feature adds the capability of toggling ON or OFF any digital control by successive activations. Formerly this would have taken two commands and a cycle command.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Rapid fire feature adds command-level repetition when digital control is ON.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Sniper assistant feature reduces mouse-emulation sensitivity by 50% when digital control is ON.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Behavior modifications can be applied to keyboard hotkeys
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Wiimote has 100% new library that improves response time (noticeably better in infrared), is much more efficient (less CPU intensive), and has improved compatibility with bluetooth stacks; infrared support has been enabled, but it's not yet accessible through the GUI
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢New location on hard disk and start menu reflecting recent change in company's name
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢New, more descriptive and accurate terminology adopted and implemented to make PGP easier to use and more intuitive. These include new dichotomies of standard versus compound commands and activated (ON) versus deactivated (OFF) states of digital controls (formerly pressed and released events).
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢You can now change POV-Style when changing to a different shift-state
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Now possible to attach notes to profiles and to individual commands in profiles. Command notes are visible in balloons activated by mouse overs in the Controller Configurations window.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Controller Configurations enhanced 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Balloon pop-ups added. These are visibile when you mouse over an icon next to a command. These are displayed for command-level assignments. They do not display event level steps (what commands are composed of)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Balloons display the following items: 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Command notes
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Cycle command components
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Double command components and method
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Force feedback effect and intensity
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Sticky, rapid fire, and sniper assistant behavior modifications
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Display shift mode
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Axis commands enhanced 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Behavior modifiers added
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Compound commands now include cycle commands
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Controller Configurations' popup-menu enhanced 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â New icons added for new features
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Along with green and blue dots, there are now purple dots to indicate keyboard hotkey assignments (previously they were also blue)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Cycle and double commands grouped together under compound commands
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Command behavior modifiers introduced 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Force feedback options for ramping and rumbling added (previously accessible via CMD+left mouse click
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â 4-way shifting system: blue, red, green, yellow
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Sticky control
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Sniper Assistant
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Rapid Fire assistant
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€Ã‚Â¦Cosmetic changes 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Tool icons reordered, repositioned, and labeled as toolbox
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â Config name repositioned to make room for shift-mode combobox
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬â€œÃ‚Â New icons added for new features like cycle, double

Known issues

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Some large icons may appear incorrectly the first time you run the beta.. This problem resolves itself after restarting PGP.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Background profile not automatically applying. Temporary workaround is to manually apply it.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Help files out-of-date. A new document system is in the works, so this will not be corrected until we are closer to a stable release.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Print Layout... currently disabled. It's being replaced by a new system.
